subject: PSYCH
title: Advanced Research Apprenticeship
description: This course involves an unpaid apprenticeship of 96 hours in a faculty member's research lab in the Department of Psychology.  Apprenticeship hours will be completed before the end of the lecture period for the term of enrolment. Students will be assigned duties that will enable them to advance their understanding of the research process. Course application forms are available on the Psychology undergraduate website. Paid or volunteer positions that are obtained outside the context of this course are not eligible for credit in this course. [Note: Grading is on a credit/no credit basis. Offered: F,W,S]
